body:
Comment 6: 
The test works for me at tip.

However, I agree that the address appears to be misaligned in your example.  It looks
like 6l is not honoring the alignment of the .rodata.cst16 section.

I think that http://golang.org/cl/5440066 will fix the problem.  Could you give
that a try?
_Status changed to **Started**._
